page.title: 13A FAMOUS PERSON
page.content: The first question we asked him was how famous he thought he was.He said about 50%.He grouped up with Andy Partaridge and Terry Chambers in about 1970.Then they were called the Helium Kidz spelt with a z.They became XTC about 1976 and they met their manager called Ian Reed.Since then they have made 7 albums. The next question was why he came to Wanborough.They were liveing in Ferndale Road and they wanted a house in the country.After three months they found a house in Wanborough that they liked. He has been a pop star for 8 years and he sells more albums abroad.He has lots of fun doing it or else he would not do it. He has been abroad lots of times.About 26 times to america and countless to Europe.He usually is reconised when
